verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%>, when he had <S%H3789>written<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto thee, O <S%H1263>Baruch<s%>;

Thou didst <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H188>Woe<s%> is me now! for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3254>added<s%> <S%H3015>grief<s%> to my <S%H4341>sorrow<s%>; I <S%H3021>fainted<s%> in my <S%H585>sighing<s%>, and I <S%H4672>find<s%> no <S%H4496>rest<s%>.

Thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> thus; Behold, that which I have <S%H1129>built<s%> will I break <S%H2040>down<s%>, and that which I have <S%H5193>planted<s%> I will pluck <S%H5428>up<s%>, even this whole <S%H776>land<s%>.

And <S%H1245>seekest<s%> thou great <S%H1419>things<s%> for thyself? <S%H1245>seek<s%> them not: for, behold, I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: but thy <S%H5315>life<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> unto thee for a <S%H7998>prey<s%> in all <S%H4725>places<s%> whither thou <S%H3212>goest<s%>.
